structure.from sentence: The structure of our model is a shallow version of the ResNet where the first seven ResNet blocks are used , i.e. , from conv1 to res3c .

numbers of channels.from sentence: All numbers of channels are set to half of the original ResNet model , for the consideration of time efficiency .

the positive and the negative.from sentence: The ratio of the positive and the negative is 1 : 1 in all experiments .

base learning rate.from sentence: The batch size is 4 ; base learning rate is set to 0.001 with a decrease of 6 % every 10,000 iterations .

vital importance.from sentence: The scale - forecast network is of vital importance to the computational cost and accuracy in the networks afterwards .

model.from sentence: We use this model in scale - forecast network and LRN .

stochastic gradient descent.from sentence: We use stochastic gradient descent as the optimizer .

scale - forecast network.from sentence: We first train the scale - forecast network and then use the output of predicted scales to launch the RSA unit and LRN .
